headline.print_headline: Dwyane Wade Scores 30, and the Heat’s Defense Rises to Stifle the Nets
headline.main: Dwyane Wade Scores 30, and Heat’s Defense Rises to Stifle the Nets

snippet: Hassan Whiteside added a career-high 27 points off the bench for Miami. Brook Lopez led the Nets with 26 points.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Whiteside added a career-high 27 points off the bench for Miami. Brook Lopez led the Nets with 26 points.
